name: Don't Drown!
description:
You have but one job:
Don't Drown.

Click the button to stay alive by keeping the water level down. But be careful, piranhas also want a piece of the action.

Controls
Use your mouse to click the button and fish as they appear. Rack up a score by keeping the water level low and defeating piranhas.

Made for Ludum Dare 46.
